lexUnit.name: sound.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: convey a specified impression when heard.

sentence.text: Obispal sounded to be on the verge of deducing the truth .
He sounds pretty cross . "
Eddie made a harsh sound that could have been intended as a laugh but sounded more like a cry of pain .
The sounds produced have a fractal sound quality -- they sound the same whether the sample generated by the program is delivered quickly or slowly .
He sounded coherent , but he was too ill and doped to have any idea what he was saying .
She sounded so apologetic that Folly almost laughed .
` He did n't sound particularly overjoyed . "
Her voice sounded dark and dangerously excited even to her own ears .
The pipes are sounding well , I thought .
This sounds well on the B flat instrument , but must have been even more thrilling on the F trumpet for which it was written .
The thump of each explosion sounded like a door being slammed far beneath our feet .
The cage was now a few fe et off the ground and the noise , which sounded like metal being torn apart , was almost deafening .
He sounded at the end of his tether , all the adrenalin summoned up for his phone call now evaporated .
We 're going mainly for wild water buffalo , banteng and seladang , " said the senator , his resonant Southern drawl sounding loud in the stillness that lay over the river .
An aria should sound exactly as the word describes , as light and inevitable as the air itself ; but to achieve that !
He knew how their voices would sound from above .
The word ` garage " , for instance , used to sound more like ` g'rahge " , almost said as one syllable .
` Do n't be scared , Tab , " she started to say , but much to her surprise , all that came out was a strange hoarse noise sounding rather like ` Craark ! "
I am fully aware of what a disengaged starter motor sounds like , Mr Warwick .
I realized that I had completely forgotten what he sounded like .
And he had no idea what a dulcimer sounded like anyway .
Her voice sounded a little strained , but only Portia caught the odd pitying look she gave Katherine as the girl rushed towards the salon .
Cornelius was trying to sound as relaxed as Sam but the piece of concrete in his larynx was making it difficult .
He , like the birds , was bubbling with the spring of the morning , but to Marian with a sense of secrecy still about her , his voice sounded strangely , dangerously , loud .
I 'd phoned my father in the evening , and he did n't sound too well , so I drove down to see how he was . "
` She sounded very upset on the phone , almost hysterical . "
It was remarkable in the circumstances that the First Symphony sounds as though it was written all at once in a burst of sustained inspiration .
SOUNDS LIKE THIS IS GOING TO BE A GREAT BACHELOR PARTY .
